ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of EDWARD EARL ARONOFF of Montréal, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada (Montréal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years, effective November 23, 2015.
